para.verbatim:
systemc-clang driver, a commandline utility for calling systemc-clang end-to-end from c++ to Verilog
Usage: python /path/to/systemc-clang.py SYSTEMC_CLANG_PARAMS --- [options] options include: -o, --output: specify Verilog output folder
Example: python ../llnl/systemc-clang.py ~/working/systemc-clang/examples/llnl-examples/zfpsynth/zfp3/z3test.cpp \ --debug -- -I ../systemc/include/ -I ../systemc-clang/examples/llnl-examples/zfpsynth/shared2/ -x c++ -w -c \ -std=c++14 -D__STDC_CONSTANT_MACROS -D__STDC_LIMIT_MACROS -DRVD \ --- -o ./z3test_hdl.txt.v
